pci_projects_project_baremetal_onboardin: You do not currently have any bare metal instances.
Our bare metal instances offer hardware servers on demand. They are delivered in a few minutes, and can be billed on an hourly or monthly basis.
This can be used like standard instances, via the customer interface where your usual infrastructure management tools are located - such as a CLI and orchestration tools.
Some features are not available on bare metal instances, like snapshots and resizing.
